targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	fcst.forecast_dttm,
	dm.city as city,
	fcst.temp as `Температура пронгоз`,
	dm.temp as `Температура факт`
  from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_actual_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'OpenWeatherMap'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
order by dm.city
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'

panels.title: Сравнение температуры (°C) прогноза (последнего) и фактической  по источнику OpenWeatherMap

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	fcst.forecast_dttm,
	dm.city as city,
	fcst.temp as `Температура пронгоз`,
	dm.temp as `Температура факт`
  from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_actual_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'WeatherApi'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
order by dm.city
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'

panels.title: Сравнение температуры (°C) прогноза (последнего) и фактической  по источнику WeatherApi

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	fcst.forecast_dttm,
	dm.city as city,
	(1 + floor(IF(dm.temp < fcst.temp,(dm.temp - fcst.temp)/fcst.temp, (fcst.temp - dm.temp)/dm.temp), 2)) * 100 AS `Точность` from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_actual_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'OpenWeatherMap'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
order by dm.city
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'

panels.title: Точность прогноза температуры (%) по источнику OpenWeatherMap (по последнему прогнозу)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	fcst.forecast_dttm,
	dm.city as city,
	(1 + floor(IF(dm.temp < fcst.temp,(dm.temp - fcst.temp)/fcst.temp, (fcst.temp - dm.temp)/dm.temp), 2)) * 100 AS `Точность` from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_actual_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'WeatherApi'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
order by dm.city
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'

panels.title: Точность прогноза температуры (%) по источнику OpenWeatherMap (по последнему прогнозу)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	dm.city as city,
	floor(avg((1 + floor(IF(dm.temp < fcst.temp,(dm.temp - fcst.temp)/fcst.temp, (fcst.temp - dm.temp)/dm.temp), 2)) * 100),2) AS `Точность прогноза`
from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_actual_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'OpenWeatherMap'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
and forecast_dttm BETWEEN parseDateTime64BestEffortOrZero('${__from:date}') AND parseDateTime64BestEffortOrZero('${__to:date}')
group by dm.city
order by `Точность прогноза`
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	fcst.forecast_dttm,
	dm.city as city,
	fcst.temp as `Температура пронгоз`,
	dm.temp as `Температура факт`
  from main.dm_weather_data_distributed dm
join allrp.ds_dim_owd dim on dm.owd_id = dim.owd_id
JOIN main.dm_forecast_all_data_distributed fcst ON toStartOfFiveMinutes(dm.create_dttm) = toStartOfFiveMinutes(forecast_dttm)
	AND dm.owd_id = fcst.owd_id
	AND dm.lang = fcst.lang
	AND dm.city = fcst.city
where owd_name = 'OpenWeatherMap'
and dm.lang = 'ru'
and forecast_diff = 24
order by dm.city
SETTINGS distributed_product_mode = 'allow'
